//Author : Jatin Goyal
//codecracker4

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 2147483647  //NA
#define ll long long int
#define all(c) c.begin(), c.end()
#define tr(container, it) for(typeof(container.begin()) it = container.begin(); it!=container.end(); it++)
#define sz(a) (int) a.size()
#define dcl(a) memset(a,0,sizeof(a))
#define rep(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define mp(a,b) make_pair(a,b)
#define pr pair<int,int>  //NA
#define pb push_back  //NA
#define gc getchar  //NA

ll t,a[1000][1000],x,y,n,m,j,i,ct;
int main()
{
	//freopen("##inp.txt","r",stdin);
    //freopen("##out.txt","w",stdout);
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>m>>n;
        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
            {
                for(j=0;j<n;j++) cin>>a[i][j];
                a[i][j]=MOD;
            }
         /*for(i=0;i<m;i++)
            {
                for(j=0;j<n;j++) cout<<a[i][j]<<' ';
               cout<<endl;
            }
*/
        for(j=0;j<=n;j++) a[i][j]=MOD;

  /*      for(i=0;i<=m;i++)
            {
                for(j=0;j<=n;j++) cout<<a[i][j]<<' ';
                cout<<endl;
            }
*/
        x=0;
        y=0;
        ct=0;
        a[x][y]=MOD;
        if((a[x][y+1]==MOD)&&(a[x+1][y]==MOD)) ct=0;
        else
        {
            while(3)
            {
               // cout<<x<<' '<<y<<endl;
                if(a[x][y+1]<a[x+1][y]) {swap(a[x][y],a[x][y+1]); y++;}
                else  {swap(a[x][y],a[x+1][y]); x++;}
                ct++;
               // if(a[x][y]==MOD) break;
               // if((a[x][y]==MOD)&&(a[x][y+1]==MOD)&&(a[x+1][y]==MOD)) break;
                if((a[x][y+1]==MOD)&&(a[x+1][y]==MOD)) break;
            }
        }

        cout<<ct<<endl;
    }
}
